text:
@realDonaldTrump President Trump some people are saying that Vitamin Therapy may help people sick with Coronavirus.  I think practicing a good diet with meats and vegetables and little sugar may help prevent it too.  I also am afraid that the isolation of our seniors may be harmful itself.
🇺🇸🌹🇺🇸
